caption:
This image depicts an aerial view of a multi-lane highway as it extends vertically through the frame. The highway appears surrounded by a variety of agricultural fields showing different stages or types of cultivation; some fields are lush and green, while others are brown or bare earth. Notably, there are adjacent parcels of land with varied uses and crops that produce a quilt-like pattern of geometric shapes in shades of green, brown, and beige.

On the left side of the highway, there is a large, rectangular body of water, its surface reflecting light. To the right of the highway, it is possible to see rows that suggest a plantation or organized farming structure. Underneath the main highway, there is a smaller road or overpass that crosses perpendicularly, creating a clear intersection.

The image captures quite a few vehicles on the highway, indicating a moment of regular traffic flow. The clarity and wide scope of the view suggest it might have been taken from a significant altitude, offering a comprehensive overview of this intersecting infrastructure and its impact on the landscape. The surrounding environment largely consists of flat terrain, utilized extensively for farming purposes.
title: Irrigated fields of the imperial valley
